text: hi everyone today recipe is Vietnamese
noodle salad or boom morning bow let's
start by slicing the beef thinly try to
slide against the grain so that the beef
can be more tender next we marinate the
beef with 1 tablespoon of oyster sauce 1
tablespoon minced garlic 1 tablespoon
wings lemongrass 1/2 a teaspoon of
pepper
1/2 a teaspoon of salt
one teaspoon seasoning powder or you can
also use sugar and finally one
tablespoon of vegetable oil mix well and
let marinate for about 15 minutes be why
we wash and drain the vegetables the
fresh vegetable you can use coriander
Ming's leaves perilla leaves letters cut
into about one inch strips and also cook
the rice to messily following the packet
instructions in a hit the block add 2
tbsp of cooking oil and fry some garlic
from the marinade since your fragrance
then add the marinated beef and still
fry on high heat until the color of the
big changes completely you want the beef
to be nice
so don't overcook it - Sam Botta dish as
some fresh vegetables on the roll
then place the stir-fried beef onto the
noodle and top up with pickle daikon and
carrots fry shallot and crush peanuts
pour some light sleeping fish sauce over
the noodle salad
laia salad dressing stir well and then
enjoy
a very fresh light and simple dish for
summer day I hope you enjoy thank you
for watching bye bye
